keyword: calories in cinnamon and raisin bagel
title: Calories in Cinnamon and Raisin Bagel
meta_description: Discover calories in cinnamon and raisin bagel, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown per bagel, and tasty tweaks for your breakfast.
h1: Calories in Cinnamon and Raisin Bagel
assumptions: Standard size (~100 g), commercially baked with raisins, cinnamon, no toppings; values based on average brand like Thomas' or generic.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cinnamon and raisin bagel has ~290 kcal, mostly from carbs with some natural sugars from raisins.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cinnamon and raisin bagel?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for a standard size.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cinnamon raisin bagel?
faqs.a: About 58 g total carbs, including 2.5 g fiber and 7 g sugars from raisins.

faqs.q: Is a cinnamon raisin bagel high in protein?
faqs.a: It provides 10 g protein per bagel, moderate for a carb-focused item.

faqs.q: How does cinnamon raisin compare to plain bagel calories?
faqs.a: Similar base (~270 kcal), but raisins add ~20 kcal from natural sugars.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in cinnamon and raisin bagels?
faqs.a: Around 370 mg per bagel, varying by brand and added salt.
